price: 58.Diggah Nanu umeyniitih yan marâ fanah rubsumne ken finqisnankeh kaak itte malayka.
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّآ أُرۡسِلۡنَآ إِلَىٰ قَوۡمٖ مُّجۡرِمِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qālū innā ur'sil'nā ilā qawmin muj'rimīna
